game.name: Astral Party
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, In-App Purchases
game.shortDescription: Astral Party is a multiplayer party game populated by cute anime girls! Choose your favorite character, strategize skills & cards, and roll the dice to destroy friendships in this unique board game.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Astral Party is a multiplayer party game populated by cute anime girls! Choose your favorite character, strategize skills & cards, and roll the dice to destroy friendships in this unique board game.
